content:
I think I'll go with a simple, understated frame that complements the artwork and my bedroom's color scheme. I want the focus to be on the artwork itself, not the frame. And I'll make sure to consider the wall space and the overall aesthetic I'm going for in my bedroom. Thanks for the tips!

By the way, I was thinking of adding some plants to my bedroom to further enhance the calming atmosphere. Do you have any recommendations for low-maintenance plants that can thrive in a bedroom with limited natural light?
